description:
Versatility transcends seasons, objectives, and conditions. Designed by trail runners but adaptable for a wide range of activities, the Motus AR Bottom delivers thermal comfort and moisture management that delivers comfort to keep you moving. Worn as a first layer, its Phasic™ AR II fabric pulls moisture off the body, provides stretch freedom, and is merrow stitched for a smooth finish. The fit is trim, and articulated patterning and a gusseted crotch elevate freedom of movement.

Crafted at a Fair Trade Certified facility as part of their commitment to transition 80% of Arc’teryx products to fair trade certification by 2025.
name: Arcteryx Motus AR Bottom, Reg - Mens
